capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Dudley Maculogy and it seems like he had a pretty interesting family history. From what I've found, Dudley's lineage is quite complex, but I can confirm that his ancestry is indeed related to maculogy.
Dudley's lineage is quite complex, I've found. It seems he has a history of maculogy issues, which can be really frustrating for him.

So, I was reading about Dudley and apparently his lineage is quite complex. It's interesting to note that he had a condition called maculogy, which affects the retina of the eye. From what I've gathered, this can lead to some pretty severe vision problems.
